name: Ker'boblin Crunch
description:
Ker'boblin Crunch Want some cereal?  Ker'boblins want cereal.  Stop them from getting all the castle's cereal.

Dusk has just settled. You know what that means? BREAKFAST TIME. Ker'boblins are just starting their day and it's time for breakfast! What's Ker'boblins' favorite breakfast food? CEREAL of course. It's got that crunch that Ker'boblins crave! 

Defend the castle's cereal and beat those Ker'boblins back! 

Made for ScoreSpace Jam #14

Gameplay

Objectives:  Merge attack power to defeat Ker'boblins! Create longer chains of items for a higher score. Power up by gaining XP and buying special items with coins!

Lose Condition:  Ker'boblins will attack after every turn! Don't let your health fall to 0 or you lose and the Ker'boblins eat all the cereal!

Mechanics

  • Drag your mouse through 2 or more items of the same type to collect them... OR drag 1 or more swords through 1 or more Ker'boblins to attack.
  • Defeat all the Ker'boblins in a wave to continue to the next wave.
  • Level up and choose buffs to help you fight off those Ker'boblins!

Pro Tips

  • Increase your damage early on so you don’t fall behind
  • Test out as many upgrades as you can
  • Save your coins for some epic gear or take a chance on the Mystery Box
  • Don't die or you'll have to start over from scratch

Tools Used

  • Unity3d
  • Spine
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Audacity
  • Movavi Video Editor
